SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b4d64f4e377848fe9e2e9c94f7d16e9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Talk02"/]Ahem...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Allow me to introduce myself
again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the resident brains of
this Rescue Corps operation.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4d64f4e377848fe9e2e9c94f7d16e9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I use the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]raw materials[System:Color name="Default"] you find and my
handmade [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]components[System:Color name="Default"] to create all kinds
of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]items [System:Color name="Default"]and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear [System:Color name="Default"]for use in the field!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d0496e71c6ee434d83981e8a91be45fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I can proudly state that all my inventions
have been perfectly perfected.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You could
even say I have it down to a...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]SCIENCE![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d0496e71c6ee434d83981e8a91be45fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]In exchange for raw material,[System:Color name="Default"] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]I provide you
with new gear.[System:Color name="Default"][etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your contributions make it
possible to continue my important work![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d0496e71c6ee434d83981e8a91be45fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I may run out of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]components [System:Color name="Default"]from time to
time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If that happens,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]visit the Lab
the next day [System:Color name="Default"]after I've restocked.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Mission_Locked_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="69f2cf8db7384932869c7b08bbfa3899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm shocked that you don't think you need
any gear from my Lab. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]In fact, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I've never
heard anything so irrational in my life![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="69f2cf8db7384932869c7b08bbfa3899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]Even so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] could you at least hand over
those raw materials?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If not for me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then for the sake of science itself!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="a3b2dd54deac4412ac1172fd092eeb36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I have no doubt that the gear and items
I've created will be pivotal to your
explorations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guarantee it!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="2d5eace46dae4c0ea0aea4e2210d6076" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I just love how science and technology
make the impossible...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]possible!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="9970509bbd2e456d8b5ef9cc18240f00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]I was worried I might get tired of creating
new [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gear[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but seeing you in action
continues to inspire me![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9970509bbd2e456d8b5ef9cc18240f00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]And that's saying something, coming from
me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I usually reserve my compliments for
the feats of empirical thought itself.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d28fc7ff26d742f882c7ae63c3ad1ca4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Our discussion just gave me a brilliant
idea![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Collect some more [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]raw material[System:Color name="Default"], and
I'd be happy to turn it into a reality.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Intro_MeetCraft_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="76c6bb6c1d0f4c38879fc4eb8db4a163" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Talk"/]I'm always busy developing new things in
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lab[System:Color name="Default"] that could be useful for rescue
operations. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]So, what do you need?
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Intro_Trial_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="bec0cbd77d664d55b2c444d61d660747" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've created a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]new item[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bec0cbd77d664d55b2c444d61d660747" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="YesFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I developed a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]prototype [System:Color name="Default"]with the
materials I had on hand.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You have to
come see for yourself!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="f0941f48398740019f51f786499878b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Science is limitless![etc:Wait frame="8"/] But you can't build
something out of nothing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I'm out of
raw materials,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I rely on components.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0941f48398740019f51f786499878b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]But those run out too![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I usually replenish
my stock by poking around the ship's
cargo.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then I'm back at it in the Lab!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0700b11fff094d8bb45ce0f99ecb06b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Pikmin are known to use collective
behavior as a survival strategy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The
success of the group benefits them all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0700b11fff094d8bb45ce0f99ecb06b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Charging Horn [System:Color name="Default"]makes use of this
habit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] stimulating the reward systems in
the Pikmin's brains using sound waves!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ef72ebcde1cf45d0828ccc015d80d6e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Wandering around aimlessly while exploring
an unfamiliar landscape is not intelligent
behavior.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's the opposite of that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ef72ebcde1cf45d0828ccc015d80d6e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Thanks to a new lens that has a wider
field of vision,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Survey Drone[System:Color name="Default"] is now
ready for practical use in the field!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="6736f0bd6533455dbbf287d377d3c2a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The rapid and reliable accumulation of
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sparklium[System:Color name="Default"] is a task that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the
captain constantly pester me about.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6736f0bd6533455dbbf287d377d3c2a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]So I'm adding a sensor to the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Treasure
Gauge[System:Color name="Default"] that amplifies the smallest of signal
spikes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That should keep them at bay!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="92d56186e2394be98586c408ba6b7031" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The latent heat released when changing a
state of matter can,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when properly
applied,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] lower temperature in an instant.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="92d56186e2394be98586c408ba6b7031" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]The principal behind the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Ice Blast[System:Color name="Default"] is
essentially this: removing heat equals
freezing. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]It's so simple, isn't it?!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ca26855805914e33996d9366160b41ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Throwing a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Pikpik Carrot[System:Color name="Default"] will often [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]distract[System:Color name="Default"]
a creature.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If they should eat it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they'll
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]be paralyzed[System:Color name="Default"] temporarily![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca26855805914e33996d9366160b41ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]If I were in your space boots and
encountered a new creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd toss them
a carrot before engaging or rushing them.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="8dd8a15775bf479db7247405bc11b8e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Emergency Kit[System:Color name="Default"]. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]This was the first
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]item[System:Color name="Default"] I prototyped after joining the Rescue
Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Such fond memories...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8dd8a15775bf479db7247405bc11b8e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The original request was to make it easy
enough for even [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to use.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After MANY
adjustments,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've finally done it!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="00b18ad563614b21b2f68b593258b8fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It's a common accident.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're throwing
Pikmin with wild abandon...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and then
accidentally chuck a bomb out there too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="00b18ad563614b21b2f68b593258b8fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]It's a terrible tragedy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it's committed
repeatedly by amateurs who haven't yet
mastered the art of a calm composure.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="902065f78562469d84d5a6be840a2efc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]As Rescue Officers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our bodies are in a
constant state of stress due to our
exposure to harsh external environments.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="902065f78562469d84d5a6be840a2efc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Of course, additional physical training can
help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the artificial enhancement the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Tuff Stuff[System:Color name="Default"] provides is also essential!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="5981f1957511449582484fb8741de08f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Our knowledge of Pikmin ecology is still
rudimentary,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but they've been observed in
two fundamental states:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] active and idle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5981f1957511449582484fb8741de08f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Idler's Alert[System:Color name="Default"] is a sound-wave induction
device that can activate Pikmin in their
lazy—[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I mean...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]idle state!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="7045bb2edbee47af82790b7fcaba2a4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When a life-form's alive,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's fundamentally
impossible to completely inhibit the minute
vibrations it continuously emits.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7045bb2edbee47af82790b7fcaba2a4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mine[System:Color name="Default"] is a device that uses this fact to
its advantage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It detects an organism's
nano-level vibrations,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then explodes!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="5f8b8bbdc2e74a16b508b464f4fc2be3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Not everyone possesses the unlimited
stamina of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and increasing one's
speed is often hindered by the body itself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f8b8bbdc2e74a16b508b464f4fc2be3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush Boots[System:Color name="Default"] increase stamina limits by
redirecting the kinetic energy generated
into a form that resupplies stamina levels.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="57422fecdbf24e7aa0290dcdadfd309f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]When an electric current passes through
an organism,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it contracts uncontrollably.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This is also called being electrocuted.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57422fecdbf24e7aa0290dcdadfd309f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The ingenious trick of the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lightning Shock[System:Color name="Default"]
is how it lowers the electrical resistance
of the target an instant before it strikes!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0135dbd64c2446ff9fea839fe8af8222" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]For Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and really all living things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
there's not much that can be done to
increase resistance to certain attacks.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0135dbd64c2446ff9fea839fe8af8222" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]An [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Ice Blast[System:Color name="Default"] will freeze any Pikmin that's
not an Ice Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lightning Shock
[System:Color name="Default"]will electrocute all but Yellow Pikmin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0135dbd64c2446ff9fea839fe8af8222" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when using a bomb,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] always be aware
of the various Pikmin types that are in
your surroundings before taking action!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3aa89d12928f4763a6ae197e9e35a31d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]When it comes to tracking,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's imperative
to think of your target first and foremost
as a source of heat.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3aa89d12928f4763a6ae197e9e35a31d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Trackonator [System:Color name="Default"]is designed to do the
same.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The mechanics it employs to detect
a target heat source are top-notch!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="cba5b38819664856a527a36c7b97bc70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]There are two elements to consider when
designing a tool that increases physical
impact—strength and number![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cba5b38819664856a527a36c7b97bc70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Triple Threat[System:Color name="Default"] focuses on the latter in
its design concept.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is to say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] more
hands equals more punches![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Kee-hee!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3e3a3a685f6b4aa2a617205a3226ad48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The element of time is key to consider
when throwing a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mine[System:Color name="Default"] or [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Trackonator
[System:Color name="Default"]and waiting for it to explode.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3e3a3a685f6b4aa2a617205a3226ad48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]Once you have a firm grasp of the timing
differentials,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's easier to aim for and
defeat ONLY your target creatures.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="e53e13bfd0c14fadb035b1e23ee32574" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you have an interest in the Lab too?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The allure of science transcends
even the barriers between species!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="a4a9c198fd964c09902965a4ecc5628c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you worry![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't forget you![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm making all sorts of [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue Pup gear
[System:Color name="Default"]for you too.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="386703b3f0e9448f94b25914131b842a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's get started!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_GadgetsCom: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="84d9b8ce7f2e46cdb5f05afaf150334b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Are you interested in an item?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Kee-hee!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_ItemComple:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="bc563ffb56174ee090ccec06b74d8575" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]Alas,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've used up all of the components
I had on hand.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc563ffb56174ee090ccec06b74d8575" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]All development has been put on pause
until my stock of components gets
replenished tomorrow.
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="119ba08ba6764a7f8338da14125734cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm very busy at the moment...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is there
something you needed?
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ad77ea88ab0c4c2498f1ee0255c27a0d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Come back and see me if there's anything
else you need!
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Outro_B01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="bc87d51591d0490294c8d8d539c3239f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Survivor" name="Glad"/]Doesn't the greatness of science simply
astonish you?
SV002.SV002_Area500_Talk_Outro_C01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="badbb9700b974fb7894658b4e5e3dfdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'd love to take this opportunity
to teach you how to use my scientific
masterpiece—the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Charging Horn[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="badbb9700b974fb7894658b4e5e3dfdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]It's actually quite simple.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.66"/]
to blow the horn once and order your
Pikmin to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]charge[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="badbb9700b974fb7894658b4e5e3dfdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]If you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.66"/] once, only [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]your selected
Pikmin [System:Color name="Default"]or [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will charge,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but keep
pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.66"/], and the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] entire squad charges[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="badbb9700b974fb7894658b4e5e3dfdc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]As you can see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this horn is perfect for
attacks or transporting objects.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You could
even call it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]Dandori dynamite!
